Package squidpony.squidmath

Class Noise.Adapted3DFrom5D

java.lang.Object
squidpony.squidmath.Noise.Adapted3DFrom5D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Noise.Noise3D
Enclosing class:
Noise
public static class Noise.Adapted3DFrom5D extends Object implements Noise.Noise3D
Used to add extra parameters to 3D noise, such as those based on rotation, time, or some non-spatial component. Using setExtras(double) to set w and u in a world made with 3D noise results in something that looks like this.

    This sets the two extra noise parameters given one parameter, theta, which is treated as looping over a circle of different w and u values, with one cycle equal to a change of 1.0 in theta.

    • setExtras

      public void setExtras​(double theta)
      This sets the two extra noise parameters given one parameter, theta, which is treated as looping over a circle of different w and u values, with one cycle equal to a change of 1.0 in theta.
      Parameters:
      theta - only the fractional part matters; used to set both w and u. Cycles if it goes past an integer.
